Families of kids with special needs bemoan COVID-19 protocols tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737477 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737477/families-of-kids-with-special-needs-bemoan-covid-19-protocols/story/ Families of children with special needs lamented that because of coronavirus disease 2019 protocols in hospitals, their kids were treated as COVID-19 suspects for exhibiting symptoms instead of being given the immediate treatment they need based on their medical history. Brgy. Capt. sa Caloocan, hinahati raw ang cash aid; misis naman ng kagawad sa QC, nanghihingi ng 'donasyon' tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737475 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737475/brgy-capt-sa-caloocan-hinahati-raw-ang-cash-aid-misis-naman-ng-kagawad-sa-qc-nanghihingi-ng-donasyon/story/ Iba't ibang sumbong ang naglalabasan laban sa mga opisyal ng barangay tungkol sa umano'y mga katiwalian sa pamamahagi ng ayuda. Sa Caloocan City, isang kapitan ng barangay ang sinasabing binabawi ang perang ipinamimigay sa mga benepisaryo ng social amelioration program (SAP) para hatiin. Sat, 09 May 2020 00:24:51 +0800

Sat, 09 May 2020 00:15:31 +0800
UP profs see 24k COVID-19 cases in June if ECQ lifted soon tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737467 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/737467/up-profs-see-24k-covid-19-cases-in-june-if-ecq-lifted-soon/story/ The national government should consider extending the enhanced community quarantine beyond May 15, 2020 in several areas, including Metro Manila, stressing that a “premature relaxation” could result in spike in COVID-19 cases and deaths, a team of University of the Philippines faculty said.“Our data suggest that a premature relaxation of the ECQ in the NCR (National Capital Region) may result in an escalation of 24,000 cases and 1,700 deaths by June 15, 2020,” the professors said in their published “COVID-19 Forecasts in the Philippines: Sub-national models for NCR and other selected area.” Fri, 08 May 2020 23:23:57 +0800
94-anyos na lola sa Caloocan, pumila para makakuha ng SAP form pero nabigo tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737469 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737469/94-anyos-na-lola-sa-caloocan-pumila-para-makakuha-ng-sap-form-pero-nabigo/story/ Kahit hindi inirerekomenda sa mga nakatatanda na lumabas ng bahay dahil sa panganib na dulot ng COVID-19, napilitan pa rin ang isang 94-anyos na lola na mag-isa na sa buhay na makipila upang makakuha kahit form ng social amelioration program (SAP). Pero umuwing bigo ang nakatatanda. Fri, 08 May 2020 23:13:04 +0800
Brgy. Capt. sa Tondo, gigisahin sa relief na spaghetti at sauce na 'di raw ipinamahagi sa mga tao tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-737466 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/737466/brgy-capt-sa-tondo-gigisahin-sa-relief-na-spaghetti-at-sauce-na-di-raw-ipinamahagi-sa-mga-tao/story/ Nasa 46 na barangay captains sa Maynila ang pinagpapaliwanag ni Mayor Isko Moreno dahil sa mga sumbong ng umano'y katiwalian sa pamamahagi ng mga ayuda sa kanilang mga nasasakupan. Ang isa sa mga punong barangay na iniimbestigahan, itinago raw ang mga spaghetti at sauce sa halip na ipinamigay sa mga tao. Fri, 08 May 2020 22:56:33 +0800
